Partner Essentials
Teladoc Health launches Provider-Based Care for Weight Management & Prediabetes solutions Teladoc Health recently announced the expansion of Provider-Based Care for our Weight Management and Prediabetes programs. With 42% of adults in the United States living with obesity, this expansion aims to drive better health outcomes while addressing the growing cost associated with obesity and weight management.
Read our press release here. <[[https://business.teladochealth.com/newsroom/press/release/Teladoc-Health-Launches-Provider-Based-Care-for-Weight-Management--Prediabetes-Programs/?&utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_content=Teladoc-Health-Launches-Provider-Based-Care-for-Weight-Management--Prediabetes-Programs&utm_term=&utm_campaign=may-partner-essentials-consultant&utm_campaign_id=]]>
Provider-Based Care is the natural evolution of our chronic condition management solutions, integrating Teladoc Health’s extensive provider network to deliver the right care at the right time for high-risk members. It was launched earlier this year for the Diabetes Management and Hypertension solutions and will be expanded into Weight Management and Prediabetes later this year. This new feature is an add on, opt in, at no additional cost for Teladoc Health clients.
Provider-Based Care is designed to help members get back into clinical control by losing weight as well as preventing and managing diabetes. By safely optimizing medications, such as glucagon-like peptide (GLP-1) agonists and sodium-glucose cotransporter-2 (SGLT2) inhibitors, the program works in conjunction with the range of Teladoc Health solutions and tools that address the foundational pillars impacting cardiometabolic health.
